net.allwebdesign.common.lib.utils
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  net.allwebdesign.common.lib.utils.Utils

public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

A class which serves as a toolkit of useful methods
It includes the following:
- normalize: sorts and converts a Map to Map

Author:
George Moraitakis

Utils

Method Detail

extractFormValues

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> extractFormValues(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
Sorts alphabetically the form values of a request based on the keys and at the same time it converts it to a Map. It will then concatenate the array of values to a single comma separated value.

Parameters:
request - the HttpServletRequest
Returns:
a comma separated value in a Map

normalize

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> normalize(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object[]> map)
Deprecated. Please use extractFormValues

Sorts alphabetically a Map based on the keys and at the same time it converts it to a Map. Useful when passing a map of this type e.g. an HttpRequest parameter map. It will then concatenate the array of values to a single comma separated value.

Parameters:
map - the Map from e.g. HttpRequest.getParameterMap()
Returns:
a comma separated value in a Map

Returns:
the fileType
word,pdf,powerpoint,excel,zip,png,gif,jpg,tif

Prepends zeroes to an integer to make it a string with 30 digits

Parameters:

Returns:

mapDelimitedValues

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> mapDelimitedValues(java.lang.String values,
                                                                                  java.lang.String delim,
                                                                                  java.lang.String... keys)
                                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
Maps a raw string of values separated by a delimiter to a list of keys.

Parameters:
values - the raw string of values separated by a delimiter
delim - the delimiter
keys - the keys to map the values to
Returns:
the mapped values
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the values do not match the number of keys

addDelimitedValuesToMap

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> addDelimitedValuesToMap(java.lang.String values,
                                                                                       java.lang.String regExDelim,
                                                                                       java.util.Map map,
                                                                                       java.lang.String... keys)
                                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
Adds to a map a raw string of values separated by a delimiter

Parameters:
values - the raw string of values separated by a delimiter
regExDelim - the delimiter which is a regular expression (e.g. for pipe delimited use \\| )
map - the map to add the values to
keys - the keys to map the values to
Returns:
the mapped values
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the values do not match the number of keys

doExcel

Returns:
